sys_security_acl.description: Allow write for all fields in x_gis_girm_assessm_software_assessment, for users with roles (x_gis_girm_assessm.software_assessor, snc_internal, x_gis_girm_assessm.user), and if the ACL script returns true, and if the ACL condition (stateIN100,230,430,500^EQ) evaluates to true.....
sys_security_acl.name: x_gis_girm_assessm_software_assessment.*
